instrucaocriacao: CREATE TABLE [dbo].[messenger_eventos](   [ID] [int] IDENTITY(1,1) NOT NULL,   [NomeTabela] [nvarchar](50) NULL,   [Registro] [int] NULL,   [IDEvento] [int] NULL,   [DataHoraEvento] [datetime] NULL,   [DataHoraDisparo] [datetime] NULL,   [Enviado] [bit] NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT [PK_messenger_eventos] PRIMARY KEY CLUSTERED (   [ID] ASC)WITH (PAD_INDEX = OFF, STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF, IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF, ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON, ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON) ON [PRIMARY]) ON [PRIMARY]ALTER TABLE [dbo].[messenger_eventos] ADD  CONSTRAINT [DF_messenger_eventos_Registro]  DEFAULT ((0)) FOR [Registro]ALTER TABLE [dbo].[messenger_eventos] ADD  CONSTRAINT [DF_messenger_eventos_IDEvento]  DEFAULT ((0)) FOR [IDEvento]ALTER TABLE [dbo].[messenger_eventos] ADD  CONSTRAINT [DF_messenger_eventos_Enviado]  DEFAULT ((0)) FOR [Enviado]
